headline: American Express to Participate in UBS Financial Services Conference
summary: NEW YORK, January 09, 2026--American Express Company (NYSE: AXP) today announced management participation in the UBS Financial Services Conference on Tuesday, February 10, 2026, beginning at 1:00 p.m. (ET).
